DataElement.preferredDefinition: A health impairment assessment self-reported response.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being.:Refers to a person's state of physical, mental and social well-being; usually it refers specifically to the state of being in good health, a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and does not consist only of the absence of disease or infirmity. In any organism health constitutes a form of homeostasis with inputs and outputs of energy and mass in approximate equilibrium allowing for growth and continued survival. In humans, a subjective feeling of well-being coming from somatic and cognitive perceptions is considered an essential component of health._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Refers to a person's state of physical, mental and social well-being; usually it refers specifically to the state of being in good health, a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and does not consist only of the absence of disease or infirmity. In any organism health constitutes a form of homeostasis with inputs and outputs of energy and mass in approximate equilibrium allowing for growth and continued survival. In humans, a subjective feeling of well-being coming from somatic and cognitive perceptions is considered an essential component of health._Loss or abnormality of psychological, physiological, or anatomic structure or function._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Severely disabled; hospital admission is indicated although death not imminent
A subjective answer of non-agreement.: No longer able to be activated or utilized.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.
No longer able to be activated or utilized.
